name: Frame to Folio
author: John Syomochkin

sections.description: If you are web-developer you want offer to post on the website implementations of your jobs. This plugin insert iframe tag linked on portfolio item.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/frame-to-folio directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin

short_description: This plugin insert iframe tag linked on portfolio item - your code implementation
description: If you are web-developer you want offer to post on the website implementations of your jobs. This plugin insert iframe tag linked on portfolio item.
